title: Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi. We present to you on the Mohazat website everything that is new and distinctive in this article. Interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of dreams by al-Nabulsi. To find see more on our website everything that is new and distinctive on the Mohazat website. Interpretation of a dream about divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin. And Nabulus: The interpretation of a dream about divorce according to Nabulus: The married man in a dream will change his separation from what he is, and the divorce of the married person nullifies his life or death, especially if he is sick. And whoever dreams of divorcing his wife is satisfied with himself, because of the Almighty’s saying: {And if they divorce, God will enrich all his capabilities}. And it was said: Whoever sees that he He divorced his wife, he divorced a king who was with him, and it was said: he separated from his authority, and divorce portends poverty, and that the woman is his master, the man, world. And whoever has a wife and sees that he divorced her will die, and likewise if he sells her or releases her, and if he divorces her he hopes for her safety. Interpretation of a dream about divorce By Ibn Shaheen: Whoever dreams that he has divorced his wife is independent of the words of God Almighty {And if they divorce, God will enrich all His power} and it was said that the dreamer of this dream divorces his boss because women conspire. . Like kings, and the dreamer was given status, then dismissed. Whoever dreams that he has divorced his wife completely, he will leave his job and does not intend to return to it. Whoever dreams that he has divorced his wife and does not have another wife, he will lose his dignity and honor, or the term of his term will approach, even if he has wives. Or maids, it is a reduction in that. Whoever sees that he divorced his wife once and she became ill and his wife is sick, then one of them has recovered from his illness, and if the divorce was three times, this indicates the death of the sick person. It was said: Whoever sees that he divorced his wife will severely punish him or accuse him of accusing him. And whoever dreams that he If he has divorced his wife and is seeking the future, he will be cut off from this world and deal with the afterlife. In general, the vision of divorce is interpreted through the wealth of the previous verse, the separation of the partner, the dismissal of the position, the breakdown of the wheel, the loss of money, and the appearance of something that he wants if he hates. Women and quarrels with a man. Other interpretations of a dream about divorce in a dream: A single person’s dream of divorce symbolizes that his condition will change for the better or for the worse. It may also symbolize the time of his approaching death. As for a married man’s dream of divorce, it indicates either the possibility of losing his job (in case he loves his wife) or the possibility of fulfilling his desires in life (in case he does not love her). To learn more about the interpretation of divorce in a dream, divorce in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of divorce in a dream For Al-Nabulsi, interpretation of the dream of seeing divorce according to Al-Nabulsi, visit the Moments website

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole olive trees in a dream?

preview.html: Trend offers you the complete interpretation of seeing olive trees in a dream. Dear followers, there are specific meanings and evidence in interpreting seeing an olive tree planted in a dream whole, as well as seeing a whole olive tree in a dream, or picking fruit from it, or climbing its branches. Seeing an olive tree in a dream full of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin narrated that he saw whole olives in a dream, He said that it is one of the blessed trees that indicate knowledge and benefit. Also, seeing an olive tree in a dream indicates strength, determination, and support in worldly life and indicates entry into the blessing in the dreamer’s future life. He also expressed that he sees a whole olive tree in a dream, and said that it is a symbol For the benevolence of relatives, which gives the dreamer a great blessing in his life. Climbing olive trees in a dream is a good omen indicating the achievement of the highest peaks of success and the fulfillment of many desires and desires. Cutting olives in a dream is completed from the visions said by Ibn Sirin as a sign of undesirable things and a sign On cutting off the offspring. What is the interpretation of seeing olives for a bowling woman? The interpretation of seeing an olive tree in a dream filled with a woman’s bowl indicates happiness and enjoyable events in her life, because it symbolizes a new life. Olives in a single person’s dream are considered a sign of strength, difficult difficulties, and evidence of the presence of people Important people in their lives. Seeing an olive tree in a dream for an unmarried woman is an interpretation of courtship and marriage to a man who will be the reason for her happiness. Seeing a girl cutting down an olive tree in a dream means severing relationships, failure in study or work, and problems in this world. What is the interpretation of seeing an olive tree for a woman For a married woman? To dream of a full olive tree is a good omen for a married woman, and it represents important and happy events in her upcoming life. Picking olives from a tree in a dream is complete for a married woman, it means a lot of goodness, wealth and blessing. The interpretation of seeing olive trees in a full dream for a woman is a sign On kindness, happiness, strength, love, family understanding, comfort and prosperity. What is the interpretation of seeing an olive tree for a pregnant woman? The interpretation of seeing an olive tree in a dream for a pregnant woman is a symbol of strength and overcoming difficulties, as it indicates the end of problems and troubles. Also, seeing a woman climbing olive trees in a complete dream It is one of the dreams that indicate an easy and accessible birth and a quick recovery. Seeing olives and eating their entire fruit in a dream is a sign that she will give birth to a child who will have a great and good benefit in their lives. What is the interpretation of seeing an olive tree planted? The interpretation of seeing olive trees planted in a dream It is one of the good visions that indicate great knowledge, control of the world, and the accumulation of wealth. Seeing a full olive tree planted in a dream is a sign of collecting money and progressing in life with more success, luck, and fulfillment of desires. Seeing olive trees in a dream full also means that the dreamer will He has a good heir and many children in this world. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in a comment below and he will contact you soon.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle of a pregnant and married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. It is known that the menstrual cycle is some physical changes that occur within the uterus and the ovary and the reason behind God Almighty creating the menstrual cycle to allow the process of procreation, and it is also known that the menstrual cycle in reality can cause a woman or girl. A lot of anxiety and pain, as there are many girls who may see their role in a dream and worry and confuse this disturbing vision, and we do not find any explanation for this. Therefore, we will provide some interpretations of this vision. What is the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman? Seeing menstrual blood is one of the visions that cause discomfort and anxiety when seen during sleep, and dream interpretation scholars have agreed that the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream is a good vision, which indicates Abundance of sustenance. Among the many good things that the dreamer will receive in his life, and since the interpretation of seeing menstrual blood is menstruation in a dream for a married woman, it is as follows: The interpretation of menstruation in a dream for a married woman is a good vision and good news, as it may indicate following an extensive diet for her and her husband, and if Barren, she will have children. But if she sees this negatively and the dream is bad for her, then this indicates darkness and problems that will come her way and she must ignore them and deal with them wisely. The meaning of the dream may differ between her and her husband, and if the dreamer is in menopause, this means that her few days The coming period will be full of activity and vitality. As for the completion of menstruation for a married woman, this indicates the need for more attention and emotions, and if the husband sees menstruation with his wife, this may mean that his wife is pregnant or that there is a new job on his way, or that they and his wife will divorce. Seeing blood Menstruation in a dream for a pregnant woman. God Almighty created mankind of two different sexes in their moral and physical characteristics, as this difference may appear in some of the visible organs of each sex, or in some of the processes that the body performs continuously, and among them among the differences that distinguish a woman from a man is the appearance The menstrual cycle, or what is called menstruation, which is the release of an amount of blood that passes through the uterus to cleanse it of any harmful organisms such as bacteria and fungi, and since seeing menstrual blood in a pregnant woman’s dream is represented as follows: If the woman is pregnant and sees menstruation in a dream, this It is a sign for her to stay away from anything dangerous that could affect the formation of the fetus. However, if a pregnant woman sees menstruation in a dream easily and smoothly, this indicates the ease of childbirth and the completion of the pregnancy without problems and health problems. Seeing a pregnant woman with menstrual blood indicates that she will enjoy With remembrance, she will be fair, obedient, and good with his family. If a pregnant woman sees that she is bleeding black blood, this means that she needs to take the necessary precautions to preserve her fetus. Some interpretations of seeing menstrual blood in a dream. Among the most important and prominent interpretations of the appearance of menstrual blood in a dream are the following: In the book of interpretation For both Imam Ibn Shirin and Imam A

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dog that bit a dog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Dogs are considered pets that people have kept since ancient times, as they used them for hunting and guarding. Also, dogs are useful to humans, and most people consider them to be animals that people keep. Dogs are very ferocious when they feel that their owner is threatened or in danger, and this is one of the things that made humans love to be provoked by dogs, and many people wonder what is the interpretation of seeing dogs bite in a dream, Does this dream have evidence or not? In this article, we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a nymph in a dream. The son and all the connotations contained in the dream. Interpretation of the dream of a dog that bit a dog in a dream by Ibn Sirin: We see animals periodically in our lives, especially dogs. It is normal for a person to see a dog in his sleep or another animal, but it is unnatural for a person to see a group of dogs standing together, as one. This dream contains many associations, and we will tell you the following clues. Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a dog in a dream According to Ibn Sirin, the dreamer may have a phobia of dogs, and due to his extreme fear, he saw them during his sleep. The dream indicates that there are things in the dreamer’s life that make him feel fear and dread, and this dream is considered by the subconscious to consider those things. The dream indicates that there are people in his life who want to harm the dreamer, Or they have actually hurt him, but he believes that they are good and love him. It indicates the occurrence of bad events in the dreamer’s life, such as losing a job or losing something acquired. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying a new car in a dream and its most important meanings by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a man’s hand. Seeing a person that a dog He bites a specific place and refuses to bite another person, which is similar to a dog insisting on biting him with his hand. This dream contains different interpretations and connotations, and then we will tell you the interpretation of a dream about a dog. Biting a man’s hand. Commentators have indicated that a dream about a dog biting a man’s hand has bad connotations and indicates some bad things. The dream indicates that the dreamer will be subjected to injustice or slander from people stronger than him who envy and envy him. If it is confirmed that the dog was bitten by a female, then the dream indicates However, the dreamer will meet a girl who causes him harm or harm and he must beware of her. If one sees in a dream that there is a dog attacking him and he is able to repel it and avoid it, then the dream indicates that the man will be able to get rid of the machinations that were prepared for him and avoid them. The problems he will face. If he dreams that he buys a new dog and then bites it, this means that he will suffer a financial loss or betrayal from an old friend. See also: Interpretation of cutting bangs in a dream and seeing hair cut by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream. There are many interpretations about dogs, but There are some explanations about white dogs. It has an intimate connotation and indicates good events and symbolizes goodness, faith, happiness and living. Here is the interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream. Commentators have indicated that seeing a white dog in a dream is considered a good vision because of its good and beautiful connotations. Seeing a dog

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Hair loss in a dream for single and married women. It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel fear, anxiety, and extreme panic, especially for women, because hair is one of the parts that are taken care of and cared for. It varied in the dream according to the social status of the viewer and the circumstances he is going through, in addition to the evidence and suggestions found in the dream and in our article. Shedding light on the interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected Imam Ibn Sirin suggested a number of interpretations and sayings related to seeing hair loss in a dream. This may be good news for the dreamer and it may be a bad omen reflected in his life, and we comment On the following points, some of them: It is possible that hair loss is a sign of a good opportunity that came to the fortuneteller but she did not take advantage of it and feels regret about it. If the dreamer catches his falling hair in a dream, this indicates that he will fulfill his promises to someone. If the hair that falls out in a dream Curly and not smooth, this is a sign that the dreamer will receive compensation. In addition, chin and armpit hair in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be able to repay his debts. In addition, the density of hair falling out in a dream is a sign of joy and pleasure that will come to The dreamer. If the dreamer has no hair in the dream, this indicates that he feels sad and anxious, and God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a strange man, which I like by Ibn Sirin and its interpretation. Interpretation of hair loss in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman sees many dreams related to hair loss in a dream. It is one of the points that she cares about a lot because it is the beautiful point that highlights her features, and that vision disturbs her dream and pushes her to search. Interpretation, and we offer you some interpretations, such as: Seeing hair loss in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the loss of anxiety, sadness, and grief that weighs on the dreamer’s heart. Seeing hair loss in a dream of an unmarried woman can indicate her approaching marriage, if she accepts it, This may be a sign of good news soon. Seeing hair loss in a dream for a single woman may indicate a separation between her and her loved one. In addition to the significance of a dream about hair loss in a dream for an unmarried woman when she touches it, her fatigue and effort will be wasted in vain. We find that Seeing hair loss in a dream for an unmarried woman could indicate that she will be exposed to problems and conflicts depending on the amount of her hair falling out. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about hair loss in a married woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing hair loss in a married woman’s dream differs from that of an unmarried girl, as her interpretation reflects the psychological state she feels, in addition to the circumstances she is going through in her married life and between her husband. Among these interpretations: We find that the meaning of hair loss in a dream for a married woman is her divorce from her husband or the solution of her problems and sorrows. In addition to seeing hair loss

title: Interpretation of a dream about dirt in Nabulsi’s dream

preview.html: I like fans subscribers fans Interpretation of a dream about dirt in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Seeing dirt in a dream has many interpretations. Man was created from dust. Seeing dirt in a dream has many interpretations and varies according to the dream. Seeing dirt in abundance or decrease has another interpretation or eating dirt has another interpretation and in this article we will show you all the possible interpretations of seeing dirt in a dream. Seeing dirt in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets that seeing dirt in a dream refers to people and can be a sign of animals and livestock. Dust is a symbol of the world and its inhabitants. Seeing dust in a dream means poverty, death and danger. Seeing dirt in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen interprets the dream of dirt as a sign of money. As for seeing dust in the house, this indicates that you will get money but without fatigue and difficulties. And for everyone who sees dust in his dreams at the height of the house, this is a warning sign to the dreamer that someone is betraying you. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is collecting dirt in a bowl, this is a sign of collecting money for a better future for his children. And whoever sees in a dream that he is eating dirt, this dream is good news for the dreamer that he will perform Hajj. As for whoever sees that he threw dirt in a dream, this is a sign of lack of money. The meaning of seeing dirt in a dream In general, seeing dirt in a dream means that someone is treating you strangely, especially in the field of work. As for seeing a dust storm, it is It shows effort and fatigue in things that do not benefit or benefit them. As for those who see dust turning into gold in any way, this indicates the presence of problems and difficulties in saving the emotional relationship. And whoever sees in his dream that he is eating dirt, this indicates that he will suffer from mistreatment from the people around you. And whoever sees the earth turning into coal, this indicates the efforts made, which bring fruitful results in the dreamer's life, and it can indicate the happy moments he lives. Interpretation of seeing dust in a dream Seeing dust in a dream can be a reflection of the psychological state and that the dreamer suffers from neglect and needs attention, and it can be a sign of the presence of goals in the past. Whoever sees himself covered in dust, this dream indicates the problems and difficulties you face in your life. And whoever sees in a dream a name covered in dust, that person who bears the name will love you, and whoever sees dust turning into gold, this indicates a mistake in your personal life. Whoever collects dust in a dream is evidence that he has gone through many trials of injustice and aggression. Freezing dust in a dream indicates an increase in the dreamer's desired goals in life. A person dusting the roof of the house is evidence of long-term changes In life and long-term need. Dust and dirt in a dream can be a sign of living a life of chaos and emotional turmoil. Therefore, we have provided you with all the interpretations of how to see dirt and dust in a dream. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Shamilol website.

title: Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream by Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing a whale in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. The whale is the largest marine animal that lives in the seas and oceans. Anyone who sees a whale in reality feels intense fear and fear due to their senses. Let the whale eat and kill, but what about seeing a whale in a dream? We will answer this question in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream by Ibn Sirin This is what Ibn Shirin said: Seeing a whale in a dream is a symbol of a place of worship of the righteous. It also indicates problems at work, stress, and sadness. A whale in a dream symbolizes an event Great will happen to the pioneer, whether good or bad. It also indicates to lose a situation. Dreaming of hunting a whale in a dream indicates that the dreamer will be exploited and seriously injured by another person. A whale in a mother’s dream is a symbol of maternal feelings, passionate and loving towards her children. Whoever dreams of a whale chasing him in the sea while swimming shows Double. Dream of whalingColorfast is good value for money. Meaning of seeing a whale in a dream for a single woman. A whale in a dream is a unique sign of fulfillment of desire and comfort. Seeing a brown whale symbolizes that a girl will get something she has been waiting for for years. Who do you see? Buying a whale shows that he will get married soon The dream of seeing a whale flying in the sky is considered a sign of a girl’s weakness. But if a girl sees that whale attacks on her in her dream, it is a sign that there is a bad young man trying to enter her life to harm her. She should be careful in her relationships. The meaning of seeing a whale in a dream for a married woman. See a whale. A married woman has Good skin, pregnancy and childbirth. The dream also indicates that the dreamer will escape from the trouble or danger that surrounds him. Seeing a whale in the sea shows the stability of the family to do with her husband. Dreaming about seeing a breed of small whales is a sign of the youth of children and their scientific and moral superiority. Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream for a pregnant woman’s vision. A whale in a pregnant woman’s dream means: Anxiety, stress at the time of childbirth. Seeing a whale game. Pleasure in a dream indicates the ease of childbirth for a pregnant woman. A whale in a dream symbolizes the great strength and kindness that a woman enjoys after giving birth. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the family situation in a comment below the article. We will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a beautiful child in a dream

preview.html: I LikeFansSubscribedFans The dream interpretation of giving birth to a beautiful baby in a dream and giving birth to a baby in a dream shows the happiness that a person will have and orgasm. As for giving birth in a dream in general, this is evidence of escaping from the anxiety in which the dreamer falls and obtaining great joy after the bad circumstances in which he fell for a long time. The interpretation of seeing a child in a dream varies depending on the social situation that the dreamer is experiencing, so this dream does not have to be good in all circumstances.Interpretation of a child by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a child CalmSeeing a child in a dream with a cunning friend in this person’s life must be careful of him.The person who sees Himself in a dream as a child is evidence of freedom from anxiety. A person who sees himself having many children will have many worries in the near future. Seeing a boy in a dream will bring prosperity and kindness. If a person sees that he is selling boys, this is a sign of good faith. Whoever saw In his nipple is a boy who has become a man, so this is a sign of his death. Interpretation of a dream about a child for an unmarried woman. The girl who sees in the dream a child. Determine what is an indication that he will emerge from worries. A newborn child in a dream for an unmarried woman portends good news. If a girl sees that her friend is giving birth to a male child. In a dream, this indicates her friend’s engagement and marriage in the near future, and if she faces problems, she will leave her soon. Interpretation of seeing a child for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman who sees a male child in her dream will give birth to a female child and vice versa. If the pregnant woman does not know the gender of the child, it will be as it appeared in the dream A pregnant woman who dreams that she is breastfeeding a male gives birth to a male. Interpretation of seeing a child for a married woman. A married woman who sees a child in her dream and already has children, this will be evidence of the difficulty of raising children. If a woman is a married woman who has not given birth and who sees a child in her dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream about a child for a man: If a man sees in his dream that he has given birth to a boy, and that man is single, then this indicates the approaching marriage. The man who sees a dream and the fact that she was born a female is evidence of the abundance of food that she gets. A married man who sees a child in a dream, this is an indication that his wife is pregnant. If a man sees a male child in a dream and his wife is pregnant, then he will actually have a male child. If a man dreams that his wife has given birth to a woman and he is unhappy, this is a sign of misery and distress that will be revealed. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of seeing advice in a dream or dreams

preview.html: There are those who see that they are giving advice or receiving advice, and the interpretation depends on my knowledge of the advisor and vice versa, and with the interpretation of the vision we will deal in detail in our topic today. Interpretation of advice by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing advice in a dream has been confirmed It reflects what a truly advisory person is. When a person dreams that someone is advising him something and it is... The content of the advice: Well, this indicates the love of the advisee and his desire to make the fortuneteller happy. This also means the love of the advisee to the fortuneteller. If someone dreams of one of his friends in a dream and advises him of something positive and for his benefit, then this is a sign of that. Love, honesty and goats between the fortuneteller and the friend. The meaning of seeing the enemy’s advice in a dream in If someone sees his enemy in a dream and advises him, it is a symbol of enmity and disagreement between them and hatred. Whoever dreams of advice from one of his relatives is there to deceive, and it is an indication of the hatred and hatred that the advisor carries in his heart for the dreamer and pretends to love him in front of him. Seeing the fortuneteller giving advice in a dream, but if one sees that he is giving advice to others, This is a sign of his wisdom and intelligence. Everyone who gives advice to others and applies it mentions people’s trust in the dreamer. Seeing the teacher’s advice in a dream. Whoever dreams of a teacher giving him advice in a dream is a sign of the presence of someone pre-determined from the student to his lessons and studies. The vision is a warning to him. Perhaps it indicates the teacher’s love for the priest and his fear of his interests. It also means the dreamer’s trust in his teacher. Interpretation of a judge’s advice in a dream. Whoever sees a judge in his dream gives him advice, which indicates that the dreamer is preoccupied with many matters that must be dealt with. Legal procedures. Perhaps it indicates the end of competition with enemies. The meaning of listening to advice in a dream. Anyone who dreams of receiving advice from One of the parents or brothers is a sign that the dreamer is entering a major crisis and needs to listen to the advice of the parents because they know him. As for someone who dreams that he received advice from his father and did not implement it, this is a sign of that. Disobedience to his father and he must review himself and obey the father. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to Marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of dates in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of dates in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq in the case of good and evil. One of the most important dreams that confuses us and many of us seek an interpretation is seeing dates and knowing the connotations that this vision carries. (Whoever eats seven Ajwa dates in the morning will not be harmed that day by poison or magic.) Interpretation of dates in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqWe find that the interpretation of dates in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq is divided as follows:Dream of dating for single womenIf a girl dreams that she is buying dates, this means That she will get married soon, God willing, while seeing dates in a dream means that she will give birth and that the children will be fair, God willing. The vision may refer to the girl’s recitation of the Holy Qur’an and an indication of the happy and peaceful life that the girl lives. It is a secret that the future is full of goodness and joy, God willing. A date in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a date in her dream, this is evidence of a peaceful life full of warmth and love, while seeing stolen dates can mean that she will face many problems and difficulties in her married life and it will affect That's on her relationship. With her husband. And if he sees that he is eating dates with the pits, this may be a sign that he is mixing between what is halal and what is forbidden, and this is a warning so that he asks God for forgiveness for what he did and repents to him, Glory be to Him, and seeing that he is eating dates with tar means that he will sleep, while the delivery of dates in a dream by a married woman It is a sign of her honor, purity, and love. A date in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing dates from a pregnant woman is good news from God Almighty and an indication that she will give birth to many children. It also means that her birth will not be difficult, but rather it will be easy and smooth. It means that he will have a girl, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The vision can be a sign that the pregnant woman is reading the Qur’an in a beautiful voice and in a good way and can give birth to the happy life that the woman lives. A date in a dream for a manWhen a man sees a date in a dream, it may mean that he will receive money From suspicious sources, and this is a warning until he ascertains the sources of this money and makes sure that it is halal, and it means that the man recites the Qur’an in a beautiful voice and that God gives him many good things. If a person sees in a dream that he is burying dates, this means that he took the orphans’ money and this is a warning until it is fulfilled. Returning the money to them. A gift of dates in a dream. In general, we find that seeing dates in a dream is a sign of benevolence, and we find that seeing a dead person in a dream and giving him dates is a sign of benevolence and abundant food that comes from God Almighty. Distributing dates in a dream. Whoever sees dates being distributed in In a dream, this is a good sign and an indication that the man is spending his money for the sake of God and helping others, and seeing dates may indicate the man’s need to exchange love with his wife and his interest in her. for him. Paste dates in a dream. A man who sees crushed dates or paste may indicate that he will enter into a big project from which he will obtain a lot of money that will not be counted and is a sign of the abundance of goodness. And the interpretation of...
